Posts.Content: May 6, 2009 03:57PM WorriedMom98 wrote: Hi Ladies, I read some of those posts and tears just came to my eyes.  But I am not sure if it is alright for me to post here.  I am a monther of 8 month old.  In late March/early April I found a lump in my right breast, upper portion close to the armpit.  Long story short, now my lump is bigger than an egg and I am scheduled for biospy this Friday.  If you don't mind, would you please tell how you first discover the lump and how it was.  I have also posted on the "not yet diagnogsed" board in details.  Thank you.
